title: Uglydoll: Goin' Places
description: OX, Wage, Babo, Ice-Bat and all their friends in the Uglyverse want you (their favorite Ugly) to join in their adventures! The Uglies are busy, busy, busy going here, there and everywhere—and you’re invited!Special guests!James Kochalka (Pinky & Stinky, Johnny Boo, American Elf)Mike KellyReads L to R (Western Style) for all ages.
author: Travis Nichols
